titleStmt.title: His Maiesties letter to the maior of Bristol together with an humble remonstrance and protestation to His Maiestie from the county of Nottingham.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: This is a London counterfeit, but the documents may be genuine. -- cf. Madan.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
